p: To identify cases of co-infection, RV RNA was tested along with those of other gastroenteritis viruses, such as norovirus, astrovirus, sapovirus, bocavirus, enterovirus, adenovirus and parechovirus. Detection of other gastroenteritis viruses was performed by polymerase chain reation (PCR) or reverse-transcription PCR (RT-PCR) as previously described (norovirus [ 22], astrovirus, sapovirus, enterovirus [ 23], parechovirus, bocavirus [ 24] and adenovirus [ 25]).
